column4: ok... how do I do that?
is it possible to get a CLI distro to run samba?
every distro is a CLI distro
yes it's 686. If you're willing to read some documentation and learn a thing or two you can try archlinux. it's 686 optimized
gentoo is a source only distro, you have to compile everything yourself
you can, but theres a large number of good linux audio players
you will only find biased answers here
